title: PFE icon
body: its about a week since they said they will be distributing the icon to previous owners of pulse fire ez and i have yet to receive my  icon, just wondering when should i be receiving it or did it all have been distributed and im the unlucky 1 percent who somehow didn't get it by chance.

replies.body: I still dont have the new PFE icon whyyy :( :( save me broporo <33
